definition.datasource:
from nxstools.pyeval import lmbd ds.result = lmbd.m2_external_data(commonblock, "$(name)", ds.$(name)_savefilename, ds.$(name)_saveallimages, ds.$(name)_filepostfix, "$var.filename", "m3")
$datasources.$(name)_savefilename $datasources.$(name)_saveallimages $datasources.$(name)_filepostfix
